calibrations.description: Spot check of water calibration for Lick spout Left. The input is the valve open time in seconds and the output is the volume of water delievered in microliters. The valve open time was selected to produce 2ul of water. This measurement was used to check the previous calibration, and was not used to set the calibration.

stimulus_epochs.notes: The duration of go cue is 100ms. The frequency is 7500Hz. Decibel is 71dB. The total reward consumed in the session is 150.0 microliter. The total reward indcluding consumed in the session and supplementary water is 2.552 millimeters.
